name: Gravity God
description:
Challenge the God of Gravity in this Rhythm-Based Platformer!

NOTE: Configure Latency using J and K if visuals are out of sync with music.

NOTE: If the game runs poorly in browser, please download it. 

NOTE: The third and fourth song is very badly synced to the gameplay. Sorry!

Gravity God was made in one week for Low-Res Jam 2021. The challenge of the jam was to create a game in 64x64 pixels, which I adhered to strictly. The game is scaled up in browser, so that you don't have to squint to see it! 

The jam also had a few optional themes, such as "Gravity is your Enemy", which I chose for inspiration, as gravity can act as your enemy (and also your friend).

Try to collect all the coins, and if you're a completionist, go for 0 deaths!

Also, please remember to rate the game if you are playing between the 15th-21st.

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Walk

Space - Jump

R - Respawn

J/K - Configure Latency

Tab - Show Deaths/Coins
